description: Negotiating cold & fussy weather requires a balance between being prepared and not over-packing. Deftly walking that fine line is the warm, tightly packable Capstone Jacket. An Anorak-style jacket with warm Primaloft® insulation, the Capstone covers all your bases, whether as a stand-alone shell or insulation-layer, with a bold color-wave that stands out on the trail.
name: Roark Capstone Zip Jacket - Mens
